problem:
问题3 若 $\arcsin x+\arctan \frac{1}{7}=\frac{\pi}{4}$, 则 $x$ 等于 ( ).
(A) $\frac{6}{7}$
(B) $\frac{3}{5}$
(C) $\frac{5}{6}$
(D) $\frac{3}{7}$
solution: B. 由已知等式得 $x=\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{4}-\arctan \frac{1}{7}\right)=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} \times \frac{7}{5 \sqrt{2}}-\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} \times \frac{1}{5 \sqrt{2}}= \frac{3}{5}$, 故选 B.
